channel.title: Music – Doobie Brothers
channel.description: Recent content in Doobie Brothers on Music

item.title: Doobie Brothers - Listen To The Music
item.description:
작곡: Johnston / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8130 / KY: 7042

Don’t you feel it
growing day by day
People gettin ready
for the news
Some are happy
some are sad
Oh we got to let
the music play
Um- what
the people need
Is a way
to make them smile
It ain’t so hard to do
if you know how
Gotta get a message
get it on through
Oh now Mama’s
going to after ‘while
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-

Well I know
you know better
Everything I say
meet me
In the country
for a day
We’ll be happy
and we’ll dance
Oh we’re gonna dance
our blues away
And if I’m feeling
good to you
And you’re feeling
good to me
There ain’t nothing
we can’t do or say
Feeling good
feeling fine
Oh baby
let the music play
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Like a lazy
flowing river
Surrounding castles
in the sky
And the crowd is
growing bigger
Listening
for the happy sounds
And I got to let
them fly
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh
listen to the music
Oh- oh listen to the
music all the time-

item.title: Doobie Brothers - Long Train Runnin'
item.description:
작곡: Johnston / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8553

Down around
the corner
a half a mile
from here
You see them
old trains runnin’
And you watch them
disappear without love
Where would you be now
without love–
You know
I saw miss Lucy
Down along
the tracks
She lost her home
and her family
And she won’t be
comin’ back
Without love
where would you
Be right now
without love–
Well the illinois
central
And the southern
central freight
Gotta keep on
pushin’ Mama
Cause you know
there’re runnin’ late
Without love
where would you be now
Now now now
without love–

Well the illinois
central
And the southern
central freight
Gotta keep on
pushin’ Mama
Know there’re runnin’
late without love
Where would you be
know without love–
Where pistons
keep on churnin’
And the wheels go
round and round
And the steel rails
are cold and
Hard in the mile
that they go down
Without love
where would you be
Right now
without love-
Where
would you be now
Mmm
got to get the baby
Thing I want to
move it down
I want to
move it down
Baby— oh won’t you
move it down
There’s
a big train run
With the train
moving on I got to
Keep on moving
keep on moving
Keep on moving
keep on moving-

item.title: Doobie Brothers - What A Fool Believes
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60657

He came from
somewhere
Back in her
long ago
The sentimental
fool don’t see
Tryin’ hard
to recreate
What had yet
to be created
Once in her life
She musters a smile
For his
nostalgic tale
Never coming near
what he wanted to say
Only to realize
It never really was
She had a place
in his life
He never made her
think twice
As he rises to
her apology
Anybody else would
surely know
He’s watching
her go
But what a fool
believes he sees
No wise man has the
power to reason away
What seems
to be
Is always better
than nothing
And nothing at
all keeps sending him
Somewhere back in
her long ago
Where he can still
believe
There’s a place
in her life
Someday somewhere
she will return
She had a place
in his life
He never made her
think twice
As he rises to
her apology
Anybody else
would surely know
He’s watching
her go
But what a fool
believes he sees
No wise man has the
power to reason away
What seems
to be
Is always better
than nothing
There’s nothing
at all
But what a fool
believes he sees
No wise man has the
power to reason away
What seems
to be
Is always better
than nothing
There’s nothing
